item.title: Urbanic 070s Coffee Grinder Guide
GPT3 Recipe Writer
item.description: I’ve seen ChatGPT everywhere at the moment so wanted to play around with the OpenAI API and see if I could come up with something useful (to me). I sometimes write up recipes for myself or friends, but have stopped largely due to laziness in making them properly readable. I wrote some code to flesh out the skeleton of a recipe into a fully-formed, readable recipe, and intend to use this regularly.
